## MGL copula

```{r setup}
library(rMGLReg)
set.seed(271)
n <- 1000
delta <- 1.2
d <- 3
U <- rcMGL.multi(n = 1000, d = d, param = 1)
cor(U, method = "kendall")

```


```{r, fig.align="center", fig.width=6, fig.height=6}
par(pty = "s")
pairs(U, gap = 0, cex = 0.5)
```


## Survival MGL copula


```{r}
set.seed(271)
n <- 1000
delta <- 1.2
d <- 3
U <- rcMGL180.multi(n = 1000, d = d, param = 1)
cor(U, method = "kendall")

```



```{r, fig.align="center", fig.width=6, fig.height=6}
par(pty = "s")
pairs(U, gap = 0, cex = 0.5)
```
